name: 富豪派对
description:
BACKGROUND WORLD

We now live in Animal City, where every citizens are talented animal characters. In order to gain more resources in this competitive city, we have to participate in a game called Rich Party.

GAME MECHANICS

Each player has capitals and cards in the very beginning. Each turn one can cast dice and makes according steps to encounter different events. When player sets foot on ownerless land, purchasing the land and constructing houses would help collecting tolls as other players stop at. There are two kinds of land, one of which can only set normal houses, while another provides functional buildings like airport station, shopping mall, and insurance company. Except the fundamental element of land and capital, players have cards that may temporarily control others’ step, exchange resources with the surroundings, or protect themselves in case of trouble. The above system forges the basic frame of the game.

FRETURES

We extend the classical Monopoly-like game to a more copious and playable gameplay.
Role-playing different animal characters to experience different strategical talents.
Manufacturing information asymmetry to make a perfect collocation with your teammate.
Buying or selling your stock to make profit; creating your commercial plan when you become the supreme shareholder of functional architectures.
Setting room rules to accelerate or moderate the pace so that the game wouldn’t last too long or run too fast.
Interacting with varies supernatural non-player characters.
Enjoying funny character performance.
Personalizing your character appearance or creating your vehicle/weapon mod in steam workshop.BACKGROUND WORLD ------------
